(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT a) (NN novel) (NN dish)))
    (. .)))


advmod(dish-6, Now-1)
nsubj(dish-6, this-2)
cop(dish-6, is-3)
det(dish-6, a-4)
nn(dish-6, novel-5)
root(ROOT-0, dish-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB never))
      (VP (VBN eaten)
        (NP (DT this))
        (SBAR (RB before) (IN so)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
              (VP (VB have)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ gold) (NN standard)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB compare)
                        (NP (PRP it))
                        (PP (TO to))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(eaten-4, I-1)
aux(eaten-4, have-2)
neg(eaten-4, never-3)
root(ROOT-0, eaten-4)
dobj(eaten-4, this-5)
advmod(have-11, before-6)
mark(have-11, so-7)
nsubj(have-11, I-8)
aux(have-11, do-9)
neg(have-11, n't-10)
advcl(eaten-4, have-11)
det(standard-14, a-12)
amod(standard-14, gold-13)
dobj(have-11, standard-14)
aux(compare-16, to-15)
infmod(standard-14, compare-16)
dobj(compare-16, it-17)
prep(compare-16, to-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Maybe))
    (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS readers))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB shed)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN bit))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NN light))))
        (PP (IN on)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (NP (DT the)
                (ADJP (RB really) (JJ good))
                (NNS ones))
              (VP (VBP are)))))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(shed-5, Maybe-1)
poss(readers-3, our-2)
nsubj(shed-5, readers-3)
aux(shed-5, can-4)
root(ROOT-0, shed-5)
det(bit-7, a-6)
dobj(shed-5, bit-7)
prep(bit-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, light-9)
prep(shed-5, on-10)
advmod(are-16, where-11)
det(ones-15, the-12)
advmod(good-14, really-13)
amod(ones-15, good-14)
nsubj(are-16, ones-15)
pcomp(on-10, are-16)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Anyway))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Anyway-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the) (NN dish))
    (VP (VBZ consists)
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ mashed) (NN potato))
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN size))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN cricket) (NN ball))
                  (VP (VBN filled)
                    (PP (IN with)
                      (NP (JJ minced) (NN beef) (NN inside)))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(dish-2, the-1)

root(ROOT-0, consists-3)
prep(consists-3, of-4)
amod(potato-6, mashed-5)
pobj(of-4, potato-6)
prep(potato-6, about-7)
det(size-9, the-8)
pobj(about-7, size-9)
prep(size-9, of-10)
det(ball-13, a-11)
nn(ball-13, cricket-12)
pobj(of-10, ball-13)
partmod(ball-13, filled-14)
prep(filled-14, with-15)
amod(inside-18, minced-16)
nn(inside-18, beef-17)
pobj(with-15, inside-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ whole) (NN thing))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (UCP
        (ADJP (RB deep) (JJ fried)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT a) (NN batter))))
        (CC and)
        (VP
          (ADVP (RB then))
          (VBN served)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN bowl))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (JJ spicy) (NN chicken) (NN soup))))))))
    (. .)))


det(thing-3, The-1)
amod(thing-3, whole-2)
nsubjpass(fried-6, thing-3)
auxpass(fried-6, is-4)
advmod(fried-6, deep-5)
root(ROOT-0, fried-6)
prep(fried-6, in-7)
det(batter-9, a-8)
pobj(in-7, batter-9)
cc(fried-6, and-10)
advmod(served-12, then-11)
conj(fried-6, served-12)
prep(served-12, in-13)
det(bowl-15, a-14)
pobj(in-13, bowl-15)
prep(bowl-15, of-16)
amod(soup-19, spicy-17)
nn(soup-19, chicken-18)
pobj(of-16, soup-19)

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Imagine)
      (UCP
        (VP (VBG eating)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ mashed) (NN potato))
            (CC and)
            (NP (JJ minced) (NN beef))))
        (CC and)
        (ADJP (RB essentially)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VBP have)
                (NP (PRP it))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG (RB Certainly)
    (PP (IN worth)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN try))
        (SBAR (IN if)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP have) (RB n't)
              (VP (VBN had)
                (NP (PRP it))
                (ADVP (RB before)))))))
      (. .))))

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN After)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ recent) (NN disappointment))
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP

    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (RB not)
      (S
        (VP (VBG wanting)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB have)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB grieve)
                      (ADVP (DT all) (IN over) (RB again))
                      (ADVP (RB so) (RB soon))
                      (PP (IN after)
                        (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ last) (NN tragedy))))))))))))
    (. .)))

aux(have-4, to-3)

xcomp(have-4, grieve-6)
dep(over-8, all-7)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (PRP$ my) (NN faith))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (DT the)
          (ADJP (JJ good) (JJ old))
          (NNP Roti) (NNP John))))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBN restored)
          (PP (IN by)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN one))
              (VP (VBN served)
                (ADVP (RB here))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NN crust))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (VP (VBN toasted)
          (SBAR (IN till)
            (S
              (NP (PRP it))
              (VP (VBD was)
                (ADJP (JJ light)
                  (CC and)
                  (JJ crispy))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT the)
          (ADJP (RB savoury) (JJ minced))
          (NN mutton))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (NN omelette))))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (ADVP (RB adequately))
        (ADJP (JJ spiced)
          (CC and)
          (JJ delicious))))
    (. .)))


det(crust-2, The-1)
nsubjpass(toasted-4, crust-2)
auxpass(toasted-4, was-3)
root(ROOT-0, toasted-4)
mark(light-8, till-5)
nsubj(light-8, it-6)
cop(light-8, was-7)
advcl(toasted-4, light-8)
cc(light-8, and-9)
conj(light-8, crispy-10)
cc(toasted-4, and-11)
det(mutton-15, the-12)
advmod(minced-14, savoury-13)
amod(mutton-15, minced-14)
nsubj(spiced-21, mutton-15)
prep(mutton-15, in-16)
det(omelette-18, the-17)
pobj(in-16, omelette-18)
cop(spiced-21, was-19)
advmod(spiced-21, adequately-20)
conj(toasted-4, spiced-21)
cc(spiced-21, and-22)
conj(spiced-21, delicious-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (ADVP (RB also))
    (VP (VBP serve)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (NP (DT a) (JJ great)
              (ADJP (JJ homemade) (JJ sweet))
              (NN chilli) (NN sauce))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VP (VB have)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN craving))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (DT the) (NNP Kentang) (NNP Ball))))
        (ADVP (RB anytime) (RB soon))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP Roti) (NNP John))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB definitely))
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (JJR better) (NNS ones))
            (ADVP (RB around))))))
    (. .)))

nn(John-3, Roti-2)
